title: Top 5 Cards Printed in Venezuela
excerpt: The most valuable vintage baseball cards that were printed and distributed exclusively in Venezuela.
author: VZLA Sports Elite

sections.heading: Top Sales – Cards Printed in Venezuela
sections.description: Rare Topps Venezuela editions — printed locally with distinct paper stock and distribution — are among the most sought-after vintage cards in the hobby.
